text: Sukoró is a holiday resort in Hungary on the north coast of Lake Velencei and at the south base of Velencei Hills. The victory at Pákozd-Sukoró in the Hungarian Revolution of 1848 established the reputation of the village. The war council before the battle was held in the protected Calvinist Church of Sukoró. == Other websites == *Sukoró.hu Category:Villages in Hungary Category:Fejér County
title: Sukoró
